item.title: Criteo provides three suggestions for increasing sales conversions
item.description: Criteo, a company specializing in digital performance display advertising, offers advice based on its collaborations within the travel industry on converting leads into customers. This guidance is relevant across all sectors. Tip #1: Strategically Time Your User Acquisition Travel app downloads peak during summer (June-September), providing a window before peak season to engage a larger active user base*. Capitalize on your customers’ planning and buying cycles by aligning download promotions for optimal new customer acquisition, Criteo recommends.
